subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Barcelona’s goal-scoring trio of Lionel Messi, Luis Suárez and Neymar put on a show in a 6-1 victory, and even Roma’s beaten goalkeeper was impressed.
snippet: Barcelona’s goal-scoring trio of Lionel Messi, Luis Suárez and Neymar put on a show in a 6-1 victory, and even Roma’s beaten goalkeeper was impressed.
